Imports

../thirdparty/opengl, ../graphics, ../core, ../nodes/node

Types

ControlHandler = proc (self: ControlRef; x, y: float): void
ControlObj = object of NodeObj
  hovered*: bool
  focused*: bool
  pressed*: bool
  mousemode*: MouseMode
  rect_position*: Vector2Ref
  rect_global_position*: Vector2Ref
  rect_size*: Vector2Ref
  rect_min_size*: Vector2Ref
  size_anchor*: Vector2Ref
  position_anchor*: AnchorRef
  background*: DrawableRef
  on_hover*: ControlHandler
  on_out*: ControlHandler
  on_click*: ControlHandler
  on_press*: ControlHandler
  on_focus*: ControlHandler
  on_unfocus*: ControlHandler
  on_release*: ControlHandler

ControlRef = ref ControlObj

Procs

proc Control(name: string = "Control"): ControlRef {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Creates a new Control object.

Calculates rect_global_position.

method move(self: ControlRef; x, y: float) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Moves Control node by x and y. Note: It also disables position_anchor. 
method move(self: ControlRef; vec2: Vector2Ref) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
Moves Control node by x and y. Note: It also disables position_anchor. 
method resize(self: ControlRef; w, h: float) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}

Resizes Control, if w or h more then rect_size. Note: It also disables size_anchor.

Arguments:

  • w is a new width.
  • h is a new height.
method setBackground(self: ControlRef; back: DrawableRef) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}

Changes background drawable.

Arguments:

  • back is a DrawableRef object.
method setBackgroundColor(self: ControlRef; color: ColorRef) {...}{.base, raises: [],
    tags: [].}

Changes background drawable color.

Arguments:

  • color is a new drawable color.

method setAnchor(self: ControlRef; anchor: AnchorRef) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}

method setSizeAnchor(self: ControlRef; w, h: float) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}

method setSizeAnchor(self: ControlRef; anchor: Vector2Ref) {...}{.base, raises: [], tags: [].}
